reviewText: This is a very bad film, it's almost like a travelog, whoever is doing the narrating is almost sound asleep, the quality of the film is poor, a total waste of ten bucks, if it's not from NGO or NOVA, I refuse to waste my money again.
It starts out with some very old footage but gets better and better along the way.  I got it for my 4-year old Granddaughter who loves Volcanos.  It held all our interest.
Wonderful archival footage of Mauna Loa and Kilauea eruptions from the 60's and 70's. A must for volcano enthusiasts!
